verses.text: \w Hear|strong="H8085"\w* this, all \add ye\add* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*; give \w ear|strong="H0238"\w*, all \add ye\add* \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* of the \w world|strong="H2465"\w*:\f + \fr 49.1 \ft for: or, of\f*
Both \w low|strong="H1121"\w* and \w high|strong="H1121"\w*, \w rich|strong="H6223"\w* and \w poor|strong="H0034"\w*, \w together|strong="H3162"\w*.

My \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w* shall \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* of \w wisdom|strong="H2454"\w*; and the \w meditation|strong="H1900"\w* of my \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* \add shall be\add* of \w understanding|strong="H8394"\w*.

I will \w incline|strong="H5186"\w* mine \w ear|strong="H0241"\w* to a \w parable|strong="H4912"\w*: I will \w open|strong="H6605"\w* my dark \w saying|strong="H2420"\w* upon the \w harp|strong="H3658"\w*.

Wherefore should I \w fear|strong="H3372"\w* in the \w days|strong="H3117"\w* of \w evil|strong="H7451"\w*, \add when\add* the \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w* of my \w heels|strong="H6120"\w* shall \w compass|strong="H5437"\w* me about?
They that \w trust|strong="H0982"\w* in their \w wealth|strong="H2428"\w*, and \w boast|strong="H1984"\w* themselves in the \w multitude|strong="H7230"\w* of their \w riches|strong="H6239"\w*;

None \add of them\add* \w can|strong="H0376"\w* by any \w means|strong="H6299"\w* \w redeem|strong="H6299"\w* his \w brother|strong="H0251"\w*, nor \w give|strong="H5414"\w* to \w God|strong="H0430"\w* a \w ransom|strong="H3724"\w* for him:
(For the \w redemption|strong="H6306"\w* of their \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* \add is\add* \w precious|strong="H3365"\w*, and it \w ceaseth|strong="H2308"\w* for \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*:)
That he should still \w live|strong="H2421"\w* for \w ever|strong="H5331"\w*, \add and\add* not \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \w corruption|strong="H7845"\w*.

For he \w seeth|strong="H7200"\w* \add that\add* wise \w men|strong="H2450"\w* \w die|strong="H4191"\w*, \w likewise|strong="H3162"\w* the \w fool|strong="H3684"\w* and the brutish \w person|strong="H1198"\w* \w perish|strong="H0006"\w*, and \w leave|strong="H5800"\w* their \w wealth|strong="H2428"\w* to \w others|strong="H0312"\w*.

Their \w inward|strong="H7130"\w* thought \add is, that\add* their \w houses|strong="H1004"\w* \add shall continue\add* for \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*, \add and\add* their \w dwelling|strong="H4908"\w* places to \w all|strong="H1755"\w* \w generations|strong="H1755"\w*; they \w call|strong="H7121"\w* \add their\add* \w lands|strong="H0127"\w* after their own \w names|strong="H8034"\w*.\f + \fr 49.11 \ft all…: Heb. generation and generation\f*

Nevertheless \w man|strong="H0120"\w* \add being\add* in \w honour|strong="H3366"\w* \w abideth|strong="H3885"\w* not: he is \w like|strong="H4911"\w* the \w beasts|strong="H0929"\w* \add that\add* \w perish|strong="H1820"\w*.

This their \w way|strong="H1870"\w* \add is\add* their \w folly|strong="H3689"\w*: yet their \w posterity|strong="H0310"\w* \w approve|strong="H7521"\w* their \w sayings|strong="H6310"\w*. \w Selah|strong="H5542"\w*.\f + \fr 49.13 \ft approve…: Heb. delight in their mouth\f*

Like \w sheep|strong="H6629"\w* they are \w laid|strong="H8371"\w* in the \w grave|strong="H7585"\w*; \w death|strong="H4194"\w* shall \w feed|strong="H7462"\w* on them; and the \w upright|strong="H3477"\w* shall have \w dominion|strong="H7287"\w* over them in the \w morning|strong="H1242"\w*; and their \w beauty|strong="H6697"\w* shall \w consume|strong="H1086"\w* in the \w grave|strong="H7585"\w* from their \w dwelling|strong="H2073"\w*.\f + \fr 49.14 \ft beauty: or, strength\f*\f + \fr 49.14 \ft in the grave from…: or, the grave being an habitation to every one of them\f*

But \w God|strong="H0430"\w* will \w redeem|strong="H6299"\w* my \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* from the \w power|strong="H3027"\w* of the \w grave|strong="H7585"\w*: for he shall \w receive|strong="H3947"\w* me. \w Selah|strong="H5542"\w*.\f + \fr 49.15 \ft power: Heb. hand\f*\f + \fr 49.15 \ft the grave: or, hell\f*

Be not thou \w afraid|strong="H3372"\w* when \w one|strong="H0376"\w* is made \w rich|strong="H6238"\w*, when the \w glory|strong="H3519"\w* of his \w house|strong="H1004"\w* is \w increased|strong="H7235"\w*;
For when he \w dieth|strong="H4194"\w* he shall carry nothing \w away|strong="H3947"\w*: his \w glory|strong="H3519"\w* shall not \w descend|strong="H3381"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* him.

Though while he \w lived|strong="H2416"\w* he \w blessed|strong="H1288"\w* his \w soul|strong="H5315"\w*: and \add men\add* will \w praise|strong="H3034"\w* thee, when thou doest \w well|strong="H3190"\w* to thyself.\f + \fr 49.18 \ft while…: Heb. in his life\f*

He shall \w go|strong="H0935"\w* to the \w generation|strong="H1755"\w* of his \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*; they shall \w never|strong="H3808"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \w light|strong="H0216"\w*.\f + \fr 49.19 \ft He…: Heb. The soul shall\f*

\w Man|strong="H0120"\w* \add that is\add* in \w honour|strong="H3366"\w*, and \w understandeth|strong="H0995"\w* not, is \w like|strong="H4911"\w* the \w beasts|strong="H0929"\w* \add that\add* \w perish|strong="H1820"\w*.
